meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Pecukonis Gretchen Neidhardt Grant McSheffrey Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7489.

td.p: Steve Pecukonis, a trainer and consultant from Brunswick, Maine
Gretchen Neidhardt, a librarian from Chicago, Illinois
Grant McSheffrey, a software developer from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (whose 2-day cash winnings total $53,400)

tr.td: PRECIOUS GEMS
CABINET DEPARTMENTS
"A" FOR THE WIN
GOT A WIFE & KIDS
IN BALTIMORE
JACK

$0

GretchenWhat is Corona?
$6,601
Dos Equis')
